synopsis.text: Now entering a realm of magic, knights, and colossal robots known as Silhouette Knights, we follow the journey of Ernesti Echevalier, once a brilliant programmer and robot enthusiast from modern Japan, now reincarnated into a noble family. After a tragic car accident, Echevalier retains his memories and passion for machines, aspiring to become a Knight Runner, the esteemed pilots of the mighty Silhouette Knights. Enrolling in the prestigious Royal Laihaila Academy alongside his childhood friends, Archid and Adeltrud Walter, Echevalier employs his extensive knowledge of programming and machinery to pursue his dream of constructing the ultimate robot. As they learn to harness their magical abilities and master the art of piloting Silhouette Knights, this ambitious trio unknowingly sets forth a series of events destined to reshape the very world they inhabit. Witness how the dreams of a robot enthusiast unfold, merging the realms of magic and technology in this thrilling and unpredictable adventure.
